message.entry: Cropping window limits must be finite.
Dimensionality of bounding box inputs and cropping window must agree.
Cropping window must be a 1-by-4 vector for rectangular bbox inputs and a 1-by-6 vector for cuboid bbox inputs.
bboxA and bboxB must have the same width.
Bounding box inputs must be numeric matrices of size M-by-4 for axis-aligned rectangles, M-by-5 for rotated rectangles, or M-by-9 for cuboids.
Rotated rectangles do not support reflection or shear transformations.
Cuboids do not support reflection or shear transformations.
Rotated rectangles and cuboids do not support 'OverlapThreshold' less than 1.
Dimensionality of input data, transformation, and spatial referencing must agree.
Invalid Dimension, the bounding box must be a 4-element row vector.
Invalid data type. The rotated rectangle bounding box must be a double or single array.
